main event: A report detailing sightings of unidentified flying objects over Mount Zion, West Virginia, in November 1957 and June 1961.
interesting points: Reddish-orange objects with silvery surfaces observed hovering and moving erratically at high speeds., The object in November 1957 was reported to be about one mile in diameter and circular in shape., The objects were speculated to be training materials dropped by the Air Force., The behavoir of the objects included a high-pitched whining sound during the observation., The report involved correspondence with an Astro Intelligence Officer regarding the sightings.
sighted object: reddish-orange objects and a metallic object
witness description: Several civilian witnesses noted in the report.
